modShortDescription: You've waited a half life for this! Quality of crafted Crowbar is governed by Miner69er perk, but this tool won't help you much to crack boulders.
modDescription:
You’ve waited a half life for this! Quality of crafted Crowbar is governed by Miner69er perk, but this [tool](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) won’t help you much to crack boulders. However safes, doors (including jail doors), hatches and heads are a different story as Crowbar does extra damage to them!

Repair with a Repair Kit and repair often as it can break!

**How to obtain Crowbar:**

* Crafting at workbench – You must first learn how to craft it by using Crowbar Schematic.
* Find it as a rare tool in loot.
* You can buy it from trader if it’s available.

This is mr.devolver’s first real mod for 7 Days to Die using Unity3D.

A big thank you to everyone who made creating this mod possible!

**Update**  
Fixed Localization.txt – now it shows full Crowbar description.

**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/v6isqh224tdapxw/Crowbar.rar)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/18590-crowbar/).

**Credits:** [mr.devolver](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/mr-devolver/)  
_Additional Credits:_ Xyth, FunFant
